column5: I have a ice hut wood stove it is mounted on a stand and it comes with all the stove pipe so if you are in need of one let me know and we can make arrangements for pick up free of charge I live 15 minutes North of Parry Sound on Shebeshekong Lake.  Cheers Mitch
Nice offer Mitch.  U da man!  I have an airtight stove in the basement level family room - love it!.  I often thought about installing 1 in my garage.
This is not an airtight wood stove it is made for ice fishing huts very light weight and will heat the hut up pretty quick.
A very kind gesture. OFC rocks.
